subject: Java Unit Testing Questions.
msgSnippet: Hi My name is Gaurav Pandey, and I am the founder of a portal on Software Testing : www.WhatIsTesting.com - A Tester s Paradise. In effort to improve the
messageBody:
Hi

My name is Gaurav Pandey, and I am the founder of a portal on Software Testing : www.WhatIsTesting.com - A Tester's Paradise.

In effort to improve the contents of the web site, we are working on interviewing senior Industry Leaders and Testers.

We are interacting with many industry leaders. In the same lines, we have to prepare an interview for Unit Testing. (Java Related)
I would appreciate it, if you would send me your Java Unit Testing Queries, so that I can prepare an interview format.

I understand, that this is not what this discussion group is meant for. However, many of us have queries, which might be answered best by Senior Industry Leaders.

Full credit to this Discussion group will be given for the questions.

Hoping for a speedy reply from all of you.

Thanks and regards
Gaurav Pandey
Gaurav@...
www.WhatIsTesting.com - A Tester's Paradise.
